text: læa nænxn xallxh di thrng hı sayya khxng phraxngkh smcring kæ phwk cea læw khna thi phwk cea khenkha phwk khea dwy xnumati khx ngxallxh cn kra thang phwk cea khlad thi ca txsu læa khadyæng kan nı kha sang læa phwk cea di fafun hlangcak thi phraxngkh di thrng hı phwk cea hen sing thi phwk cea chxb læw cak nan mi phu thi txngkar lok ni læa cak phwk cea nan mi phu thi txngkar prlok(læw phraxngkh k thrng hı phwk cea han klab khak phwk khea seiy pheux thi ca thrng thdsxb phwk cea læa nænxn phraxngkh di thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk cea læw læa xallxh nan pen phuthrng mi phrakhun kæ phu sraththa thanghlay)
